205.author: Gabriel Coler
205.bottom_line:
The Central Oregon Avalanche Center issues avalanche forecasts for Friday, Saturday, Sunday, and Monday.  On Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday no danger rating is issued.  There are often public or profesional observations that are submitted during this time, and that you may find useful.

Watch for signs of unstable snow such as recent avalanches, cracking in the snow, and audible collapsing.  Avoid traveling on or under similar slopes.
